name: kafka_starter
description: Reads client events from inbound Kafka topics, validates them, and forwards valid events to normalization topics. Errors are written to a client-facing error topic.

args.name: client-orders-topic
args.description: Kafka topic the client publishes orders to.

args.name: client-executions-topic
args.description: Kafka topic the client publishes executions to.

args.name: client-transactions-topic
args.description: Kafka topic the client publishes transactions to.

args.name: client-errors-topic
args.description: Kafka topic where validation errors are written back to the client.
